paper_abstract: Multi-dimensional uncertain differential equation is a system of uncertain differential equations driven by a multi-dimensional Liu process. This paper first gives the analytic solutions of two special types of multi-dimensional uncertain differential equations. After that, it proves that the multi-dimensional uncertain differential equation has a unique solution provided that its coefficients satisfy the Lipschitz condition and the linear growth condition.
paper_title: Multi-dimensional uncertain differential equation: existence and uniqueness of solution
